smsSettings.body: Dear $recipientName$, please check your email for an important update regarding your account $recipientNumber$. - Altinn Team

emailSettings.subject: Important Update Regarding Your Account
emailSettings.body:
Dear $recipientName$,

We wanted to inform you about an important update to your account $recipientNumber$. Please log in to your dashboard to review the changes.

Best regards,
Altinn Team

emailSettings.subject: Reminder 2: Important Update Regarding Your Account
emailSettings.body:
Dear $recipientName$,

This is your second reminder about an important update to your account $recipientNumber$.

Best regards,
Altinn Team

smsSettings.body: REMINDER 3: Important update for account $recipientNumber$. - Altinn

emailSettings.subject: Reminder 3: Important Update Regarding Your Account
emailSettings.body:

smsSettings.body: FINAL REMINDER: Important update for account $recipientNumber$. - Altinn

emailSettings.subject: FINAL REMINDER: Important Update Regarding Your Account
